page.title: 01LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Spare time activities-West Ewell
Television. Of the survey taken the average was two sets per family , one colour, one momchrome. Only one family had no T.V set, one family had one monochrome, one family had 5 colour sets. A total of 900 hours per week were spent watching T.V. i.e. an average of 12 per week per family surveyed. 3 families spent 35 hours viewing. 2 families spent 30 hours, 5 families spent 20-25 hours, 12 families spent 15-20 hours, 17 families spent 10-15 hours and 11 families spent less than 10 hours viewing. About half of the group surveyed owned video recorders and most of these hired films for them.This time was counted as viewing time .
